definition: at a distance of/distance/to be apart
to leave/to part from/to be away from/(in giving distances) from/without (sth)/independent of/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing fire/☲

pinyin: jin4 ju4 li2 wu2 xian4 tong1 xun4

sentences.english: Are you aware that many researchers are convinced that prolonged close work causes myopia?
sentences.chinese: 你认为，许多研究员确信长期近距离工作引起近视吗？

sentences.english: He was mowed down by the assassin at point-blank range.
sentences.chinese: 他被暗杀者的近距离开枪打死。

sentences.english: I am honoured to have had the opportunity to see a Lynx up close and personal.
sentences.chinese: 可是我很荣幸地能够有机会近距离看到这个猞猁。

sentences.english: Darvin had not seen Yao Ming up close for awhile.
sentences.chinese: 达尔文已经很久没有这么近距离的看见过姚明了。

sentences.english: The flip pass is necessary during a close exchange of the ball.
sentences.chinese: 在近距离换球时，短传是很必要的。

sentences.english: Proximity will make the subject strike you in a different way.
sentences.chinese: 近距离会使摄影主体给你不同的感受力。

sentences.english: The pilot of the fighter plane even declares a near-collision.
sentences.chinese: 战斗机的飞行员甚至还宣称跟它有近距离碰触。

sentences.english: The Moisturizing Shaving System is equipped with a dual blade system to give you an ultra close shave.
sentences.chinese: 剃的保湿系统，配备了双刀片系统给你一个超近距离。

sentences.english: This is my first time to be so close to a white whale.
sentences.chinese: 头一次和白鲸有这么近距离的接触。

sentences.english: People who do an excessive amount of near vision work may experience a false or "pseudo" myopia.
sentences.chinese: 过度的近距离用眼工作会使人患有假性近视。

sentences.english: This is the first time Guan Baoying close contact with gay people.
sentences.chinese: 这是关宝英第一次近距离接触男同性恋人群。

sentences.english: Airgun pellets don't usually penetrate skin but can do so at close range.
sentences.chinese: 空气枪子弹通常不会贯穿皮肤，但若是近距离就可以。

sentences.english: Bullfrog 50 Inflicts poison when your enemy damages you at short range.
sentences.chinese: 牛娃50对近距离攻击你的敌人造成毒伤。

sentences.english: Use artificial light sparingly for filming or photography, especially for close-ups.
sentences.chinese: 照相时少用人工光源，尤其是在近距离时。

sentences.english: Here is a closeup of the one-way valve before gluing.
sentences.chinese: 这里是一个近距离的一个单向阀前粘合。

sentences.english: The green, pinched in the front by the penetrating bunkers, angles away from the golfers approach.
sentences.chinese: 通过渗透式沙坑挤压在前方的果岭进行近距离切球。

definition: to rake with machine gunfire/to strafe/to machine-gun down
gap in coverage/gap in protection or defenses/neglected or overlooked area/dead end
to press close to/to snuggle close/intimate
to stay out of (hot water, trouble, awkward situation etc)/to avoid (sb)
gap (between two objects)/interval of time (between events)/opening in one's schedule/free time/(fig.) gap (in the market etc)
